data.name: Chronicles of Mystery - The Tree of Life
data.detailed_description:
When knowledge becomes lethal

Find the legendary Tree of Life, which grants immortality to whoever tastes it’s fruits. Your search will lead you across the channels of Venice, through the dark alleys of Cairo and further into the unknown. Chased by ruthless assassins, you will have to solve ancient riddles and face a power that eludes the rules of logic.

• Exciting, compelling story featuring Sylvie Leroux, a young archaeologist
• Challenging puzzles requiring wits and logical thinking
• Detailed, eye catching graphics

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
